column4: i installed ubuntu last night only to realize that it doesnt install gcc why not i dont know but i cant get my wireless card unless i use a version of ndiswrapper thats above 1.4 so i either needed to get the ndiswrapper package or the gcc package i would rather the gcc package where can i download it from
and what directory would i need to place it in
click on system administration and then pick synaptic package manager and search for gcc
it should be on the cd
